title: On compliance with the terms and conditions, the building permission shall be given, in accordance with the provisions under section 45 of the M
clause_text: On compliance with the terms and conditions, the building permission shall be given, in accordance with the provisions under section 45 of the M.R. & T.P. Act, 1966 to the Project under the SRS, first to the Rehabilitation component and thereafter to the free-sale component subject to the provisions in clause below.
section: Building Permission for Slum Rehabilitation Project

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
